oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Illness, for which the Doctor is called in, believed to be caused by butterflies. The narrators personal experience of this. Bushman children not allowed to throw stones at butterflies. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-20. 7753-7752. rev. and 7753 rev.). !gixa
